ThingDef.label: monitor lizard egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized monitor lizard egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby monitor lizard. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: monitor lizard egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized monitor lizard egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: mastodon wool
ThingDef.description: Thick shaggy wool from a mastodon. Provides excellent insulation against the cold.

ThingDef.label: muskox wool
ThingDef.description: Itchy wool from a muskox. Good at keeping the cold out.
